timeline.bodyText:
I don't think you need explicitly set shared TcpDiscoverySpi here, this step should be done at GridAbstractTest#getConfiguration(String igniteInstanceName, IgniteTestResources rsrcs).
Please take a look at GridAbstractTest.sharedStaticIpFinder and its usages.
